name: MataCryl Trafficable
Details
Scope Description (from Bravada SOW) and item numbers
Enter SOW description
Attach TDS for application (Download from Simpro)
1: Concrete Pour of Trough & Maintenance areas
1.01: Confirmation of date of concrete pour
1.02: Substrate inspection
2: Lead up to installation
2.01: Confirmation of product batch numbers and use by dates (photograph) WITNESS POINT
2.02: Conduct preparation to substrates including shot blasting, grinding, other methods HOLD POINT
2.03: Minimum 7 days after concrete pour. Install pull off test equipment to deck and conduct test. Minimum 0.75mpa. Photograph HOLD POINT
2.04: Conduct moisture test ( < 7%) WITNESS POINT
3: Day prior to commencement
3.01: Inspect concrete deck condition, assess cleanliness and readiness for installation.. HOLD POINT
3.02: Conduct moisture test ( < 7% ). HOLD POINT
3.03: Review suitability of weather forecast for next 4 days, photograph WITNESS POINT
4: Day of works commencement
4.01: Prior to commencement, inspect concrete deck condition, assess cleanliness and readiness for installation. Photograph. HOLD POINT
4.02: Test substrate moisture content ( < 7% ). HOLD POINT
4.03: Test ambient temperature (10-35 degrees) Photograph WITNESS POINT
4.04: Test substrate temperature (10-35 degrees) Photograph HOLD POINT
4.05: Test dew point temperature (minimum 3 degrees less than ambient temperature). HOLD POINT
5: Matacryl Primer H Application
5.01: Mix primer liquid component separately, sprinkle catalyst and mix thoroughly until homogenous (fully mixed through)
5.02: Install product to required coverage rate and record quantity of product installed (40m2 per kit/unit). Photograph WITNESS POINT
5.03: Quartz aggregate broadcast into primer at 1kg/m2. Photograph. HOLD POINT
6: Matacryl Manual Base Coat Application
6.01: Test primer for suitability to proceed to membrane installation. Photograph. HOLD POINT
6.02: Test substrate moisture content ( < 7% ). HOLD POINT
6.03: Test ambient temperature (10-35 degrees) Photograph WITNESS POINT
6.04: Test substrate temperature (10-35 degrees) Photograph HOLD POINT
6.05 Test dew point temperature (3 degrees greater than ambient temperature). HOLD POINT
6.06: Mix liquid membrane component separately, sprinkle catalyst and mix thoroughly until homogenous (fully mixed through) WITNESS POINT
6.04: Install membrane to required coverage rate (2.8kg/m2) and record quantity of product installed (maximum 8.9m2/mixed kit). Photograph WITNESS POINT
6.05: Measure wet film thickness of membrane during installation - minimum 1 measurement per membrane kit (8.9m2/kit) . Photograph WITNEESS POINT
7: Matacryl WL Application
7.01: Test Manual for suitability to proceed to WL installation. Photograph. HOLD POINT
7.02: Test substrate moisture content ( < 7% ). HOLD POINT
7.03: Test ambient temperature (10-35 degrees) Photograph WITNESS POINT
7.04: Test substrate temperature (10-35 degrees) Photograph HOLD POINT
7.05: Test dew point temperature (3 degrees greater than ambient temperature). HOLD POINT
7.06: Mix liquid "wearing layer" component separately, sprinkle catalyst and mix thoroughly until homogenous (fully mixed through)
7.07: Install WL layer to required coverage rate (16.6m2/mixed kit) and record quantity of product installed. Photograph
7.08: Broadcast aggregate into wet top coat (4kg/m2). Photograph
8: Matacryl STC Unpigmented Plus Micronised Pigment Top Coat Application
8.01: Test WL for suitability to proceed to top coat installation. Photograph. HOLD POINT
8.02: Test substrate moisture content ( < 7% ). HOLD POINT
8.03: Test ambient temperature (10-35 degrees) Photograph WITNESS POINT
8.04: Test substrate temperature (10-35 degrees) Photograph HOLD POINT
8.05: Test dew point temperature (3 degrees greater than ambient temperature). HOLD POINT
8.06: Mix liquid topcoat component separately, sprinkle catalyst and mix thoroughly until homogenous (fully mixed through)
8.07: Install 2 x topcoat to required coverage rate (40m2/mixed kit) and record quantity of product installed. Photograph
9: Post installation - Adhesion testing to Membrane / Manual layer ONLY
9.01: Test membrane system for suitability to proceed to pull off test (minimum 1hr). HOLD POINT
9.02: Install pull off test dollys at rate of 1/100m2, conduct pull off test minimum 45 mins after installation
9.03: Measure and record pull off test result, minimum 0.75mpa photograph HOLD POINT
9.04: Measure and record pull off test result for membrane dry film thickness (2mm) HOLD POINT
9.05: Repair pull off test areas including concrete repair, Martacryl Primer H, Matacryl Manual, Matacryl STC with broadcast aggregate WITNESS POINT
10: Post installation
10.01: Remedy test results uploaded into Bravada CONQA QA platform. Photograph, WITNESS POINT
10.02: Review Bravada CONQA QA/ITP, confirm compliance, handover to SEPA. SIGNATURE
